570220.name: Farming Simulator 17 - KUHN Equipment Pack
570220.description:
Expand your gaming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator 17! This DLC contains 18 new implements from KUHN.

The DLC contains the following equipment:
  • KUHN AXIS 40.2 M-EMC -W – Fertilizer spreader
  • KUHN BTF 4000 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN DC 401 - Cultivator
  • KUHN DELTIS 1302 MEA3 – Sprayer
  • KUHN DISCOLANDER XM 52 – Cultivator
  • KUHN ESPRO 3000 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN FBP 3135 – Baler
  • KUHN GF 8702 – Tedder
  • KUHN GMD 4411 – Mower
  • KUHN HR 4004 – Cultivator
  • KUHN LSB 1290 D – Baler
  • KUHN MERGE MAXX 902 – Windrower
  • KUHN METRIS 4102 – Sprayer
  • KUHN PERFORMER 4000 – Cultivator
  • KUHN PF 1500 – Sprayer Front Tank
  • KUHN PLANTER 3R 12 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN SW 4014 AutoLoad – Bale wrapper
  • KUHN TF 1500 – Sowing Machine Front Tank

Once downloaded, the additional content will be available through the in-game shop. Be sure to have sufficient in-game currency to buy them!
570220.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 土耳其语
